page.title: 13Crediton Library
page.content: Crediton Library is at the bottom of Deep Lane. It is a big library with a {children's area}and an{adult area}and a{display area.} The Library also provides a {travelling library}which goes round to Primary Schools. In the school{holidays}the Library workers{read stories}to young children. The Library has lots of{different {kinds}of books. They have non-fiction(true), fiction(not true), reference books and{large print}books for people with not so good eyesight. They say that you may not take out any reference books. They also hire out{audio cassettes at 20p a tape per week.
